column4: hey folks I have configured my modem and there is no dial tone can anyone suggest the right AT strings which I need to put
I would really appreciate if someone could at least try to help me out...I have been breaking my head for two days now...
Winmodem?
it's the internal modem which came with my laptop....It's configured and ATZ also says OK and also ATQ0 V1 E1 S0=0 &C1 &D2 +FCLASS=0
what modem is it? or what kind of laptop?
compaq presario v2000 series
sec
sure :)
u there?
i am. looking it up
thanks
I guess it has this modem        Conexant AC97 Data Fax Modem with SmartCP Driver
the problem is that you fdo not have a modem, you have a sound card. that's a Winmodem. and Winmodems are nothing but sound cards that do all their modulation in software.
oh!
so what can be done about it ?
there are some Winmodem solutions (some sl-modem-daemon or something) but they are tricky.
that's package I installed and gnome-ppp and also wvdial are querying the modem.....
OK, i'm not familiar at all with that package. i haven't used a modem in a long, long time.
I was just curious to configure it, coz I tried and never succeed
before
do you *need* the modem, or are you just curious?
I need the modem, I want to configure this device with ubuntu/linux
